Student_ApplicationObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Student_ApplicationObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Student_ApplicationObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: The reference to the existing Student Application

Admission_DecisionObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Admission_DecisionObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Waitlist_or_Defer_Decision_Status_Data.description: Reference ID for the Admission Decision.

Admission_Decision_ReasonObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Admission_Decision_ReasonObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Waitlist_or_Defer_Decision_Status_Data.description: Reference ID for the Admission Decision Reason.

description: Contains data for editing a Waitlist or Defer Status on a Student Application.

validation.validation: You can't assign a Waitlist or Defer Decision status to the application because it is applying to a Fast Path-enabled program of study.
Specify a status or remove the status reason.
Specify an application status of Waitlist or Defer Decision.
Specify an admission decision reason that is active.
You can't assign a Waitlist or Defer Decision status to the application because it is inactive.
Specify an application status reason that is valid for the specified application status. Valid reasons for the specified status include: [valid_admission_decision_reasons].
You can't assign a Waitlist or Defer Decision status to the application because it already has a published admissions decision.
Specify an application status reason that is valid for the academic unit and academic level of the application. Valid reasons include: [valid_admission_decision_reasons]
